page.title: 15GAMES COLEHILL CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: In the summer we play outside games. I play skipping with my friends. Christopher's favourite game is {colours,}two people hold the rope and choose a colour and the two people jumping over the rope say the colour.Madeleine likes{"swing and {drop"}.The children run along in a circle. They run to you and you say"swing or drop" and they say one or other and we do as they choose.Michael likes the game{ghost catchers.}You pretend there is a ghost and you catch it. Another friend likes {hopscotch. There are numbers one to ten drawn in boxes on the ground. Someone throws a stone to 1.and then hops to 10.with the stone.You have to get up to 10.with your stone.Indoor games we like are Monopoly,connect-four,and stay-alive.We like to play games on our computers.SUSY ROCKALL9yrs.et al.
